com.c195_software_ii__advanced_java_concepts_pa.AppointmentController

public class AppointmentController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Appointment page for updating and creating new appointments.

    • getAvailableAppointmentID

      public int getAvailableAppointmentID() throws SQLException
      Finds the next available appointmentID.
      Returns:
      newAppointmentID
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • selectCustomer

      public Customer selectCustomer(Appointment appointment)

    • selectContact

      public Contact selectContact(Appointment appointment)

    • sendAppointment

      public void sendAppointment(Appointment appointment)
      Sends appointment to Appointment page. When update button is pressed in AppointmentCustomerPage, the selected appointment's information is sent to the Appointment page to fill each of the fields, and the page is set to "update mode".
      Parameters:
      appointment - the appointment to update

    • onActionSetEndDate

      void onActionSetEndDate(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Sets End date to same day as Start Date. When date is selected in StartDate DatePickers, set date in EndDate DatePicker to same day.
      Parameters:
      event - Date picked in StartDate DatePicker
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onActionCancel

      void onActionCancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Sends user back to AppointmentCustomerPage. If any fields are filled, user is prompted to continue.
      Parameters:
      event - Cancel button is pressed
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onActionSaveAppointment

      void onActionSaveAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Create/Update Appointment after button is pressed. Afterwords, user is sent to AppointmentCustomerPage. If any values are empty, user is alerted.
      Parameters:
      event - Create/Update Appointment Button is pressed
      Throws:
      IOException

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes page. Sets the appointmentIDTextField, ComboBoxes, and DatePickers
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:

      resourceBundle -
